definition: Bangui, capital of Central African Republic (Tw)

sentences.english: Our reporter says fighting is continuing in Demara and that the atmosphere in Bangui is very tense.
sentences.chinese: 記者稱大馬士革的戰鬥仍在繼續，班基的氣氛很緊張。

definition: Santander, capital of Spanish autonomous region Cantabria 坎塔布里亞|坎塔布里亚[Kan3 ta3 bu4 li3 ya4]
Bia, daughter of Pallas and Styx in Greek mythology, personification of violence
Kinshasa, capital of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (Tw)

(Tw) (slang) a prank, prevalent in Chinese schools and known as "happy corner" in Hong Kong, in which several people carry a victim with his legs spread open, bringing his groin up against a pole or tree trunk
Aruba, island in the Caribbean, a self-governing part of the Netherlands
Goran Hadžić (1958-), Croatian Serb leader until 1994, indicted war criminal
Safi (Moroccan city on the Atlantic coast)
Walloon, inhabitant of Southern French-speaking area of Belgium
